title: Requires the department of labor to restore the New York state unemployment insurance telephone claims center to lower Manhattan
summary: Requires the department of labor to restore the New York state unemployment insurance telephone claims center to lower Manhattan.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1934

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WRIGHT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Labor

       AN  ACT  requiring the New York state department of labor to restore the
         New York state unemployment insurance telephone claims center back  to
         the New York city area

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The New York state department of labor  shall  restore  the
    2  New  York  state  unemployment insurance telephone claims center back to
    3  the New York city area. Staffing levels shall be restored  to  pre-April
    4  12,  2005  status,  including but not limited to the retention of the 49
    5  employees who may want to return to such positions, such  employees  who
    6  were  transferred  to  other  departments  and certain retirees who felt
    7  forced to retire due to the movement of such offices from lower  Manhat-
    8  tan to Troy, New York.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05655-01-1
actClause: AN ACT requiring the New York state department of labor to restore the New York state unemployment insurance telephone claims center back to the New York city area
